channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Tried These Brain-Tracking Headphones That Claim to Improve Focus
item.description: Neurable’s MW75 Neuro is an everyday brain-computer interface that aims to boost your productivity. It also raises questions about data privacy.

item.title: Pinterest launches a feature to let users remix collages created by others
item.description: Pinterest created an engaging format with collages last year, which allows users to combine images and cutouts to create new content. The company is n...

item.title: What Really Happened While Filming Hodor’s Fateful 'Game of Thrones' Scene
item.description: In 2016, Game of Thrones fans online went wild when they found out the meaning of Hodor’s name. In this excerpt from his memoir Beyond the Throne, Kri...

item.title: WP Engine sends cease-and-desist letter to Automattic over Mullenweg’s comments
item.description: Mullenweg, who co-created WordPress, last week criticized WP Engine for raking in profits without giving much back to the open source project. © 2024 ...

item.title: Nike's NewCEO Has One Hell of a Challenge Ahead
item.description: A ruinous pandemic business strategy, declining innovation, exodus of talent, and a “worst sneaker of all time” accolade has laid the world's biggest ...

item.title: GitHub will allow enterprise cloud customers to store data in the EU
item.description: Starting from October 29, GitHub says that all enterprise cloud customers will be able to select an EU region to store all their code. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: Generative AI Hype Feels Inescapable. Tackle It Head On With Education
item.description: In their book AI Snake Oil, two Princeton researchers pinpoint the culprits of the AI hype cycle and advocate for a more critical, holistic understand...

item.title: Fintech Jupiter in talks to buy a stake in SBM Bank India
item.description: In the latest instance of an Indian fintech startup pursuing strategic partnerships with traditional banking institutions, neobank Jupiter is in talks...

item.title: Dyson Promo Code: Up to $200 Off Vacuums (September 2024)
item.description: Save up to $200 on Dyson's cordless vacuums including the V12 Detect, Gen5Detect, and more.

item.title: Crypto scammers hack OpenAI’s press account on X
